name: Down The Social Ladder
description:
Down The Social Ladder

Roll down the social ladder. Be the fastest to do so.
Collect booze on the way - it helps to get down to the bottom faster.
Controls - mouse or touchscreen (if on mobile). Keyboard controls are quite broken (left-right arrows, AD).
Developed by one dude and hundreds of others, who made assets I used and bought on sale. Game is quite buggy.

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Blender
  • DALL-E - thumbnail
  • LootLocker - leaderboard API

Assets:

  • Polygon Particle FX - Synty Studios
  • Polygon City - Synty Studios
  • Polygon Icons - Synty Studios
  • A Casual Music Pack - Cafofo
  • FREE Casual Game SFX Pack - Dustyroom
  • GUI PRO Kit - Simple Casual - Layer Lab
  • Highlight Plus - Kronnect
  • Curvy Splines 8 - Toolbuddy
